channel.title: Albert Einstein on Superphysics
channel.description: Recent content in Albert Einstein on Superphysics

item.title: Ether and General Relativity
item.description: The idea of the ether comes from= the theory of action at a distance the properties of light which have led to the undulatory theory Outside of physics, we know nothing of action at a distance*. *Superphysics note= This is false because most actions in metaphysics are actions at a distance. It seems to us that there are only actions of immediate contact= collision push and pull heating or inducing combustion by means of a flame, etc.
